# PACTSstudy

This package contains data and code to replicate the analysis of the PACTS Study, a randomised controlled trial conducted in Blantyre, Malawi.

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("petermacp/PACTSstudy")
```
